      • createAccount

        @PostMapping(value="/account")
public java.lang.String createAccount(@RequestParam(value="accountNumber")
                                                                      java.lang.Integer accountNumber,
                                                                      @RequestParam(value="pin")
                                                                      java.lang.Integer pin,
                                                                      @RequestParam(value="openingBalance")
                                                                      java.lang.Integer openingBalance,
                                                                      @RequestParam(value="overdraft")
                                                                      java.lang.Integer overdraft)
        This REST endpoint is used to create an Account
        Parameters:
        accountNumber - the account number of the account
        pin - the pin of the account
        openingBalance - the openingBalance of the account
        overdraft - the overdraft of the account
        Returns:
        new id of the account

      • updatePin

        @GetMapping(value="/updatepin")
public java.lang.String updatePin(@RequestParam(value="id")
                                                                   java.lang.Integer id,
                                                                   @RequestParam(value="oldpin")
                                                                   java.lang.Integer oldPin,
                                                                   @RequestParam(value="newpin")
                                                                   java.lang.Integer newPin)
        This REST endpoint is used to update an Account pin
        Parameters:
        id - the id of the account
        oldPin - the old (current) pin of the account
        newPin - the new pin of the account
        Returns:
        success message or message statin oldPin is incorrect
